#
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! This file is generated by `pwrforge update`.
#
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.22)

list(APPEND CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/generators/")
set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS ON)

# Add definiton [ATSAM, ESP32, STM32, X86] depending on current build target
string(TOUPPER $ENV{pwrforge_BUILD_TARGET} pwrforge_BUILD_TARGET)
add_definitions(-D${pwrforge_BUILD_TARGET})


project(
  common_pwrforge_project_atsam
  VERSION 0.1.0
  DESCRIPTION "Project description."
  HOMEPAGE_URL "www.hello-world.com"
  LANGUAGES C CXX ASM)


if(NOT ${pwrforge_BUILD_TARGET} STREQUAL ESP32)
  set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin)
  add_subdirectory(src)
endif()
